mapper.select: SELECT gubuncode, gubunname, parentcode FROM goodsgubun WHERE gubuncode != 2 START WITH gubuncode=2 CONNECT BY PRIOR gubuncode=parentcode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(goodsCode, goodsName, price, state, gubunCode) VALUES (#{goodsCode}, #{goodsName}, #{price}, #{state}, #{gubunCode})
INSERT INTO goodsImg(goodsImgCode ,saveFilename, originalFilename, goodsCode) VALUES (goodsImg_seq.NEXTVAL, #{saveFileName}, #{orignalFileName}, #{goodsCode})
mapper.select: select goodsImgCode, saveFileName, originalFileName, goodsCode FROM goodsImg WHERE goodsCode = #{goodsCode} ORDER BY goodsImgCode

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goods
AND INSTR(goodsName, #{searchValue}) > 0

sql.if: WHERE gubuncode IN ( SELECT gubuncode FROM goodsgubun WHERE gubuncode != 2 START WITH gubuncode=2 CONNECT BY PRIOR gubuncode=parentcode )

mapper.select: SELECT g.goodsCode, goodsName, price, state, g.gubuncode, gubunName, memo as content, NVL(likeGoods,0) likeCount, NVL(quantity,0) quantity FROM goods g LEFT JOIN ( select SUM(quantity) likeGoods, goodsCode from paymentInfo GROUP BY goodscode ) p ON g.goodsCode=p.goodsCode LEFT JOIN goodsCount c ON g.goodsCode = c.goodsCode LEFT JOIN goodsGubun b ON g.gubuncode = b.gubuncode LEFT JOIN goodsInfo gi ON g.goodsCode = gi.goodsCode WHERE g.goodsCode = #{goodsCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET goodsName=#{goodsName}, price=#{price}, state=#{state}, gubunCode=#{gubunCode} WHERE goodsCode=#{goodsCode}
UPDATE goodsInfo SET memo=#{content}, insertDate=SYSDATE WHERE goodsCode=#{goodsCode}
